1.title: The Long Road to a Cabin
1.plot: What happens when a video game character is self-aware? Maia tries to understand her reality, while fighting bad guys.

imdb.plot outline: It seems like everywhere she goes, Maia is followed by men in suits, and she doesn't know why. She struggles for survival while trying to solve her mystery. Meanwhile, Maria is an enigmatic woman, who "works at the University." She crosses paths with Maia in a way that Maia might never fully understand.
imdb.title: Target of Desire
plot: What happens when a video game character is self-aware? Maia tries to understand her reality, while fighting bad guys.

It seems like everywhere she goes, Maia is followed by men in suits, and she doesn't know why. She struggles for survival while trying to solve her mystery. Meanwhile, Maria is an enigmatic woman, who "works at the University." She crosses paths with Maia in a way that Maia might never fully understand.
